org.seedstack.business.api.interfaces.assembler

Interface FluentAssembler


  • public interface FluentAssembler
    FluentAssembler provides the entry point for the assembler DSL.

    As Assembler it allows to assemble aggregate to DTOs, or merge DTOs into aggregates. But compare to Assembler, it's not typed so you can do it programmatically, the DSL will find the appropriate assembler to call. It also provides more advanced features like automatically retrieving an aggregate from its repository. Or automatically creating it from its factory.

    Author:
    pierre.thirouin@ext.mpsa.com (Pierre Thirouin)
